segments.text: The language used in this multinational company is mainly about English ; do you think you can manage to handle that ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Yes . I am sure I can . I was an English major in college .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: What about your second foreign language since you were an English major ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Russian is my second foreign language and I excelled the rest of my class in Russian because my father is a Russian .
segments.speaker: S2
